alert.note: Alert for San Diego County Coastal Areas; San Diego County Inland Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 15 at 10:25AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern San Diego County through 1130 AM PST... At 1023 AM PST, Doppler radar was tracking a line of storms from Imperial Beach to La Jolla, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and frequent cloud to ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Chula Vista, El Cajon, National City, La Mesa, Poway, Imperial Beach, Coronado, Mission Valley, Hillcrest, Linda Vista, North Park, Midway District Including Lindbergh Field, Tierrasanta, University City, Downtown San Diego, La Jolla, Point Loma, Mission Beach, Santee, and Lemon Grove. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: San Diego County Coastal Areas; San Diego County Inland Valleys
